Run redccdÂ¶

It is the first step in the reduction process, the main tasks are listed below.

  • Create master bias
  • Create master flats
  • Apply Corrections:
    • Overscan
    • Trim image
    • Detect slit and trim out non-illuminated areas
    • Bias correction
    • Normalized flat field correction
    • Cosmic ray rejection
